result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael A Boyd was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Michael A Boyd is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Michael A Boyd was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: comply with any and all counseling recommended by Agent

timeConds.notes: Sentenced to 30 days in Marquette County Jail with huber. Report on or before July 17, 2015 by 7:00 p.m. clean & sober. Huber to include childcare when no one else is available.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael A Boyd

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Michael A Boyd in court with attorney Ryan T. Frank.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CF16, 14CM187 & 14CT62 tracking together:
Atty Hendee states that the State filed a motion to terminate on 14CT62.  Atty Hendee states that the defendant will not be objecting to termination of the DPA.  Atty Hendee moves to amend Ct. 1 in 15CF16.   Atty Hendee states plea agreement to the amended Ct. 1 in 15CF16 and Ct. 1 in 14CM187 and the charge in 14CT62.
Atty Frank has no objection to the amended charge or the termination of the DPA in 14CT62.
BY THE COURT:  Ct. 1 in 15CF16 will be amended to remove the repeater.
Atty Frank enters a No Contest plea.  Defendant agrees.
  Court questions defendant regarding plea. Advises of Constitutional Rights and elements of the charge.  Court finds plea made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.  Atty Hendee relies on the criminal complaint for a factual basis.

BY THE COURT:  DPA in 14CT62 will be terminated.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charges.  Court accepts defendant's plea and finds defendant guilty of the amended Ct. 1 in 15CF16 and Ct. 1 in 14CM187 and the charge in 14CT62.
Ct. 2 in 14CM187 to be dismissed.
Counts 2 & 3 to be dismissed in 15CF16.

Atty Frank asks the court to follow the recommendation.

BY THE COURT:  Ct. 1 in 15CF16 & Ct. 1 in 14CM187:  Withhold Sentence; 24 months Probation with conditions: 
30 days in the Marquette County Jail w/huber on Ct. 1 in 15CF16
  Report on or before July 17, 2015 by 7:00pm, clean & sober.
Huber will include child care when noone else is available
Credit = 0
Court Costs = $243.00 on each
AODA and any follow-up treatment
Comply with any and all counseling recommended by the Agent
Restitution = $197.48 + surcharge = $217.22
Ct. 2 in 14CM187 to be dismissed.
Counts 2 & 3 to be dismissed in 15CF16.

14CT62:  Court orders 5 days in the Marquette County Jail w/huber; concurrent to the Probation case.
Report on or before July 17, 2015 by 7:00pm, clean & sober.
Court Costs  = $243.00

Defendant Michael A Boyd in court with attorney Ryan T. Frank.  Andrew Christianson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
14CM187 & 14CT62 tracking:
  Atty Christianson states that in speaking with Atty Frank; the defendant will be waiving the Prelim today.  Atty Frank agrees and has discussed the waiver with his client.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant agrees with the waiver.  Court accepts the waiver of the Prelim.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and this defendant committed it.  Case bound over for trial or further proceedings.

Atty Christianson files the information with the Court.  Atty Frank states that the Defendant received a copy of the information and waives its reading.  Atty Frank enters a Not Guilty plea.

  BY THE COURT:  Court enters a Not Guilty plea.
Set for Return.
bond continued.  Return date scheduled for May 21, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Michael A Boyd in court with attorney Ryan T. Frank.  Andrew J. Christenson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
**15CF16, 14CT62 & 14CM187 tracking together
 
15CF16:
  Atty Frank states that the Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.  Atty Frank states that the defendant is not contesting the motion to terminate the DPA on 14CT62.  Atty Frank states that the defendant is waiving the time limits for the Prelim on 15CF16.

BY THE COURT:  Court grants the motion to terminate the DPA on 14CT62 and finds the defendant guilty of that charge.
Time limits waived for the Prelim on 15CF16.

  Atty Christenson has no objection to a signature bond with conditions.
Atty Frank has no objection.
BY THE COURT: Court sets a $500 Signature bond with conditions:
*Appear for booking today  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 22, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
